## Family
Adele Ervin's sibling is Lisha Leibowitz.
The sister of Adele Ervin is Lisha Leibowitz.
The mother of Adele Ervin is Karen Ervin.
The father of Adele Ervin is Boris Ervin.

The date of birth of Adele Ervin is 0259-06-10.
The occupation of Adele Ervin is personal assistant.
The hobby of Adele Ervin is meditation.
The gender of Adele Ervin is female.
